bond_characteristics.issue_price_percent: Issue price as percentage of nominal
bond_characteristics.redemption_price_percent: Redemption price as percentage of nominal
bond_characteristics.amount_issued: Total amount issued in currency units
bond_characteristics.conversion_price: Price at which bond converts to shares

put_option.put_date: Date put option can be exercised

soft_call.has_soft_call: Whether bond has soft call provision (boolean)

dividends.threshold_schedule: Array of date-threshold pairs if variable
